ENV.description: Set This To True If You Don't Want To Crash The Bot.

APP_NAME.description: Copy-Paste The Heroku App Name Typed Above.

BIN_CHANNEL.description: The BIN Channel ID. Read The README For Info About This VAR.

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB URI For Saving UserIDs When They First Start the Bot.

BANNED_CHANNELS.description: Put IDs of Banned Channels Where Bot Won't Work.

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Put a Public Channel Username(w/o @), So Every User Have to Join That Channel To Use The Bot. Must Add Bot To The Channel To Work Properly.

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Floodwait Sleep Timer. Read The README For Info About This VAR.

WORKERS.description: No. Of Workers That Is To Be Assigned. Read The README For Info About This VAR.

PORT.description: Port That You Want Your App To Be Listened To. Read The README For Info About This VAR.

NO_PORT.description: If You Don't Want Your Port To Be Displayed. Read The README For Info About This VAR.

BIND_ADRESS.description: Read The README For Info About This VAR

FQDN.description: Read The README For Info About This VAR

SESSION_NAME.description: Session Name for Bot [ Add PROFESSOR ]
